tutorial.speak:
Every B1 account comes with a website. To access your website builder, click Website in the left menu.
This opens Website Pages where you can manage pages and content. Click Add Page at the top right.
Choose blank as the page type and name it Home.
Click Edit to start building your page.
Click Page Settings to configure the title and URL.
Click the edit pencil.
Edit your page title and URL path here.
For the home page, enter a forward slash with no text. Other pages use forward slash and page title. Click Save.
Click Edit Content to begin adding content.
Click Add Content to open the elements panel.
Every page must begin with a Section. Choose Section to add a container.
Drag a Section onto your page.
Click the section and switch to the CUSTOM tab.
The CUSTOM tab controls colors for backgrounds, headings, text, and links.
Click the Background Type dropdown.
Choose Image to upload a background image.
Or choose YouTube Video to add a video background.
Select Color and choose a background color.
Add an optional section ID for advanced styling.
Click Save.
Your section displays with the custom background.
Click MOBILE to preview mobile layout.
Click Add Content again.
Choose from text, images, videos, cards, forms, and more.
Drag a Text element into your section.
Type your text and customize formatting. Click Save.
Drag an Image element below your text.
Click Select Photo.
Upload images or download stock photos. Select an image.
Click Save.
Your section displays with text and image.
Preview your complete website.
